fetch module¶

class fetch.SDSSDataFetcher[source]¶

Bases: object

fetch_by_adql(adql_query)[source]¶

Fetch data from SDSS using an ADQL query.

input: ADQL query string

fetch_by_constraints(table_name, num, constraints)[source]¶

Fetch data from SDSS based on constraints.

input: {constraint variable: constraint value} e.g. {‘ra’: ‘<10’, ‘dec’: ‘>0’}

process_sdss_format_data(data)[source]¶

Process data already in SDSS format. input: data in csv format.
